peregrine.io
Class ExtractWriter

java.lang.Object
  peregrine.io.ExtractWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, SequenceWriter
public class ExtractWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable, SequenceWriter

Take a given stream of input in the form of (K,V) and route it and write the data to the correct partition. If your data is already partitioned, with the correct algorithm, at least right now you can run these in parallel
